g.text: starts the creation of a payment transaction of a finished/executed task
requests the necessary data on the payment transaction
a brief description of the task (id, brief description, time duration (in hours), cost per hour (in euros) and task category),
details about the execution of the task (end date, delay, brief description of the quality of the work)
and information about the freelancer that worked on the task
(id, name, level of expertise, e-mail, NIF, bank account (IBAN), address and country)
frlId, name, expertiseLevel, email, NIF, IBAN, address, country)
validates and displays the payment transaction data and also the amount to pay to each freelancer, asking for confirmation
records the payment transaction data and informs the organization's collaborator of the success of the operation
